wikipedia_page.main: David Gwyn Thomas (born 26 September 1957) is a Welsh former professional footballer who played as a midfielder.

response: *Gwyn Thomas (sportsman) (1891–1932), Welsh cricketer for Glamorgan CCC, and rugby union footballer for Neath RFC
*Gwyn Thomas (rugby), rugby union and rugby league footballer of the 1910s, and 1920s
